verbose_text: The C-terminal half of Vif contains three conserved motifs : (1) the HCCH domain, which chelates zinc mediates the interaction with Cul5; (2) the SLQ motif, which binds elongin C (Elo C); and (3) the PPLP motif, which is important for Vif dimerization and recruitment of A3G, albeit by an unknown mechanism.
